title: Unfortunate Donations
itunes:title: Unfortunate Donations
description:
Today on the show we had Jim Jones stop by where he spoke about new music, The Lox Verzuz Dipset, Freddie Gibbs and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man who broke up with his girl after she donated a kidney to him. In fact, we opened the phone lines to see if any of our listeners would donate a kidney to their significant other if needed to. We also had friends to the room Styles P and Havoc stop by where he spoke about new collab album, loyalty, and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had Jim Jones stop by where he spoke about new music, The Lox Verzuz Dipset, Freddie Gibbs and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man who broke up with his girl after she donated a kidney to him. In fact, we opened the phone lines to see if any of our listeners would donate a kidney to their significant other if needed to. We also had friends to the room Styles P and Havoc stop by where he spoke about new collab album, loyalty, and more.
